sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Typography, Container, Grid, IconButton } from '@mui/material';
import GitHubIcon from '@mui/icons-material/GitHub';
import LinkedInIcon from '@mui/icons-material/LinkedIn';
import TwitterIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Twitter';
import Pic from '../pic.jpg'; // Import the local image

interface AuthorProps {
  darkMode: boolean;
}

const Author: React.FC<AuthorProps> = ({ darkMode }) => {
  return (
    <Container
      maxWidth="md"
      sx={{
        minHeight: '100vh',
        display: 'flex',
        flexDirection: 'column',
        alignItems: 'center',
        padding: 4,
        bgcolor: darkMode ? '#1a1a1a' : '#ffffff',
        color: darkMode ? '#e0e0e0' : '#333333',
        py: 8, // Add some vertical padding
        boxShadow: 3, // Add a subtle shadow to the container
        borderRadius: 2, // Rounded corners for the container
        mt: 4, // Margin top
        mb: 4, // Margin bottom
      }}
    >
      <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', mb: 6 }}>
        <Box
          component="img"
          src={Pic} // Use the imported local image
          alt="Subham Kumar"
          sx={{
            width: 200,
            height: 200,
            borderRadius: '50%',
            objectFit: 'cover',
            mb: 4,
            border: `4px solid ${darkMode ? '#424242' : '#e0e0e0'}`, // Add a border around the image
          }}
        />
        <Typography variant="h3" component="h1" gutterBottom sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333', fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
          Hi there! I'm Subham.
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="h6" paragraph sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#bdbdbd' : '#666666', fontStyle: 'italic' }}>
          I started building on the web in 2007 and never stopped.
        </Typography>
      </Box>

      <Box sx={{ mb: 6, maxWidth: '800px', mx: 'auto' }}>
        <Typography variant="body1" paragraph sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#e0e0e0' : '#333333', lineHeight: 1.8 }}>
          I've worked in senior engineering positions at organizations like Gatsby (acq. Netlify), DigitalOcean, and Khan Academy. I've also taught web development fundamentals at Concordia University.
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="body1" paragraph sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#e0e0e0' : '#333333', lineHeight: 1.8 }}>
          These days, I'm a solo indie hacker focused on empowering up-and-coming software developers.
        </Typography>
      </Box>

      <Typography variant="h4" sx={{ mt: 4, mb: 3, color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333', fontWeight: 'bold' }}>Work Experience</Typography>
      <Grid container spacing={3} sx={{ width: '100%', mb: 6 }}>
        <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
          <Box sx={{ bgcolor: darkMode ? '#212121' : '#eeeeee', p: 3, borderRadius: 2, boxShadow: 3, borderLeft: `4px solid ${darkMode ? '#66bb6a' : '#4caf50'}` }}>
            <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333', fontWeight: 'medium' }}>Frontend Engineer Intern</Typography>
            <Typography variant="subtitle1" color="textSecondary" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#bdbdbd' : '#666666' }}>at Sportthon from Jan 2025 to March 2025</Typography>
            <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#e0e0e0' : '#333333' }}>React, CSS, RestAPI, MySQL</Typography>
          </Box>
        </Grid>
        <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
          <Box sx={{ bgcolor: darkMode ? '#212121' : '#eeeeee', p: 3, borderRadius: 2, boxShadow: 3, borderLeft: `4px solid ${darkMode ? '#ffa726' : '#ff9800'}` }}>
            <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333', fontWeight: 'medium' }}>Open Source Contributor</Typography>
            <Typography variant="subtitle1" color="textSecondary" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#bdbdbd' : '#666666' }}>from Dec 2023 to April 2024</Typography>
            <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#e0e0e0' : '#333333' }}>Metamask, Circuitverse, OpenMRS</Typography>
          </Box>
        </Grid>
        <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
          <Box sx={{ bgcolor: darkMode ? '#212121' : '#eeeeee', p: 3, borderRadius: 2, boxShadow: 3, borderLeft: `4px solid ${darkMode ? '#0288d1' : '#03a9f4'}` }}>
            <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333', fontWeight: 'medium' }}>Open Source Mentor</Typography>
            <Typography variant="subtitle1" color="textSecondary" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#bdbdbd' : '#666666' }}>at Circuitverse from May 2025 to August 2025</Typography>
          </Box>
        </Grid>
      </Grid>

      <Typography variant="h4" sx={{ mt: 4, mb: 3, color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333', fontWeight: 'bold' }}>Education</Typography>
       <Box sx={{ bgcolor: darkMode ? '#212121' : '#eeeeee', p: 3, borderRadius: 2, boxShadow: 3, width: '100%', mb: 6, borderLeft: `4px solid ${darkMode ? '#9575cd' : '#673ab7'}` }}>
          <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333', fontWeight: 'medium' }}>Integrated Master of Technology (B.Tech + M.Tech)</Typography>
          <Typography variant="subtitle1" color="textSecondary" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#bdbdbd' : '#666666' }}>in Mathematics and Computing from Dec 2021 to April 2026</Typography>
        </Box>

      <Typography variant="h4" sx={{ mt: 4, mb: 3, color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333', fontWeight: 'bold' }}>Find me on</Typography>
      <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', mb: 6 }}>
        <IconButton href="https://github.com/yourusername" target="_blank" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#bdbdbd' : '#666666', '&:hover': { color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333' }, m: 1 }}>
          <GitHubIcon fontSize="large"/>
        </IconButton>
        <IconButton href="https://linkedin.com/in/yourusername" target="_blank" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#bdbdbd' : '#666666', '&:hover': { color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333' }, m: 1 }}>
          <LinkedInIcon fontSize="large"/>
        </IconButton>
        <IconButton href="https://twitter.com/yourusername" target="_blank" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#bdbdbd' : '#666666', '&:hover': { color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333' }, m: 1 }}>
          <TwitterIcon fontSize="large"/>
        </IconButton>
      </Box>
    </Container>
  );
};

export default Author;
